 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תְּוַהּ‎</span> **verb** ==be startled, alarmed== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] ***id.***, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — ***Pe\`al*** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ת‎</span> [[Dan.3.24|Dan 3:24]].
